short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cactus Link provides seamless access to DeFi and Web3 across both EVM and non-EVM chains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our Chrome extension ensures secure connections to decentralised sites within major ecosystems, supporting diverse cryptocurrencies and networks with regular expansion updates. This end-to-end security allows users to engage with DApps and Web3 confidently and effortlessly.

We also offer support for custom cryptocurrency additions, allowing you to integrate tokens not yet supported by our system into DeFi accounts using their contract addresses.

Based in Hong Kong and ISO-certified, Cactus Custody safeguards billions in digital assets. As the institutional custody service of Matrixport, Asia's fastest-growing digital assets financial platform, we provide cold and warm storage, enterprise crypto management, and DeFi connectivity for miners, corporations, funds, and projects.

For more information, visit https://www.mycactus.com
For technical support, contact support@mycactus.com
